Articles.Content: I have just designed a small buggy/rover that will be suitable for use on the Mun, and I also have a craft sufficient to get it there, but how do I load both in the VAB at the same time so that I can put the two together? Is there a way, or do you have to build everything in one go?

Look for the Mod called "Sub Assembly Loader", it will do just what your after.

(Im not to sure in its compatibility with 2.0 yet though)

EDIT: Here is the link

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/subassembly-saver-loader/
That looks just the ticket. I'm surprised it's not a standard feature of the game.
The subassembly loader does not work in 0.20, so get the (temporary) fix here.
